targets.query: SELECT distinct("hash") FROM "Sonarr" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "name",  "downloaded", "sxe"

SELECT distinct("hash") FROM "Sonarr" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "name",  "downloaded", "sxe"

SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory/usage" WHERE ("container_name"   !~ /kubepods.*/ AND "container_name"   !~ /system.slice.*/ AND "container_name"   !~ /user.slice.*/  ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "container_name" fill(none)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu/usage_rate" WHERE ("container_name"   !~ /kubepods.*/ AND "container_name"   !~ /system.slice.*/ AND "container_name"   !~ /user.slice.*/  ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "container_name" fill(none)
